title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal
Technique: cut and uncut pile in a silk foundation faced with silver metal (velvet)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 15.8 x 11.5 cm (6 1/4 x 4 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Pattern of floral sprigs in green, blue and brown pile in grid of brown pile on a silver faced white silk ground.
